## Vector3.scaleBy() method

Scale this vector by a scalar number.

**Signature:**

```typescript
scaleBy(f: number): Vector3;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  f | number | amount to scale this vector by. |
